title: give brolaf back his spellvamp or remove it from lee sin
body:
a very long time ago brolafs kit involved spellvamp as well as lifesteal on his w, currently as rank one brolaf gets 40% attack speed, 9% lifesteal
and increased healing. while lee gets lifesteal, spellvamp, a shield, mobility as well as 40% attack speed. now i am not crying for lee sin nerfs, but reverting the spellvamp would but brolaf in a better position for jungling in season 5, as many of you know, it would effectively reduce the health cost of brolafs e. and make it easier to jungle on higher hp for longer insead of being on 25% hp all the time and fearing a wild lee sin will appear and kill me with one q.

also what is up with Ragnarok passive being removed on activation? thats just silly 

also if you have any comments, or do no agree, explain below why

replies.body: Brolaf is one of those champions, that if he gets too fed he will 1v2 or even 1v3 for days, heck he snowballs even harder than Riven.
so alistar gets a free bf sword and 70% damage reduction. and brolaf can't keep his 30 mr/ armor?
i'm silver but i guess that was a bad comparison, just like to hear what everyone thinks

He still has spell vamp (sort of) and his E can actually give you health.

When your E kills something and refunds the health cost, it acts as a heal. So, say your E costs 50 health and you have a spirit visage, if we take the increased healing you'll get 60 health back if you kill a unit and if you activate his W then do it, you'll get even MORE health because of the additional healing. And even if you have spell vamp, it wouldn't give a lot of health back anyway. Say your E does 300 true damage and you have 6% spell vamp from runes, it will give back 18 health. That's pathetic.

As for your ult, it's a tradeoff. The passive of your ult encourages you to build health, not resists. It turns Olaf from a tank into an off-tank assassin.

Just get 40% CDR on Olaf and he becomes stupidly strong.
Pretty sure the shield on Lee is like practically nothing and the attack speed he gets is from passive. Also shield > lifesteal is like health of his energy.

Olaf's jungle is fine, spellvamp wouldn't proc off his E anyway, as it deals true damage. olaf also loses armor and mr when he turns his ult on because he exchanges it for a bloodthirster/IE/merc. scimitars worth of damage at rank 3 (lvl16+), even at rank 1, you still trade 10 armor+mr (around 400gp worth) for 40 ad (1440gp worth). olaf's lifesteal also increases dramatically as his health drops, making it go well over 40% if he's weak.
Wrong. True damage does proc spellvamp. If that true damage is from a spell (Not autoattacks like Irelia's W), it will proc it. I've tried 6% spell vamp on Darius.
